bio: M.S. IT Management student at Tulane University focused on data, cloud, and practical systems delivery. Product-minded builder with a software engineering foundation and experience delivering client-facing systems — from legacy modernization and workflow digitization to performance optimization and SEO. Comfortable in situations to define problems, iterate quickly, and ship practical solutions. When I'm not coding, you'll find me training for my next marathon or exploring new places.

placesLived.description: Growing up in the KC metro

timeline.title: Shipment Unloader at Midland Industries
timeline.description: Followed processing operations for large shipments and managed sorting of stock within the warehouse (summers 2019–2021)

timeline.title: Started at LSU
timeline.description: Began studying Computer Science (Software Engineering) at Louisiana State University

timeline.title: Technical Intern at DataMap LLC
timeline.description: Led design, development, and demo of a cloud-based guided buying application for streamlined employee procurement and payment processes

timeline.title: DataMap Internship Completed
timeline.description: Executed testing scripts for critical release updates, ensuring performance across client portfolios

timeline.title: Graduated from LSU
timeline.description: Earned B.S. in Computer Science (Software Engineering) — Ogden Honors College

timeline.title: Started M.S. at Tulane
timeline.description: Began M.S. in Information Technology Management with a Graduate Certificate in Data Science & Cloud

timeline.title: Contracted Developer at Beyond79
timeline.description: Architected and refactored legacy PHP 5.x codebase to PHP 8, redesigned backend schemas, delivered UI/UX overhauls boosting SEO and engagement

timeline.title: Developer at Vernon LLC
timeline.description: Supporting a 4-person startup delivering manufacturing process digitization and custom client automations
